TITLE: Episode 126 - Almonds and the American Spirit with Whipping Spoon
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by our good friend Whip a.k.a. Whipping Spoon. A thoroughly American man who could easily be the most handsome man that Shelby Lee Adams should photograph, Whip is an almond farmer out of California and a character. Join us as we chat about the farm, how living in maybe the least free state in America has affected him, and what it means to be American.
